Title: Gli Immortali
Writer: Roberto Saviano (idea), Roberto Saviano (novel), Giovanni Bianconi (developer), Stefano Bises (developer), Leonardo Fasoli (developer), Ludovica Rampoldi (developer), Roberto Saviano (developer), Stefano Bises (story), Stefano Bises (story), Leonardo Fasoli (story), Leonardo Fasoli (teleplay), Maddalena Ravagli (teleplay)
Actors: Marco D'Amore, Fortunato Cerlino, Maria Pia Calzone, Salvatore Esposito
Plot: After Imma's death, Genny finds a CD with the registration of the conversation between Ciro and Manu, so he plans to kill all the oldest men of the clan. Ciro Realizes Genny's plan and meets Conte to convince him to kill Genny and his boys.
